column4: Hey everyone. I'm on a fresh install of the Gusty beta. I have compiz and all working with the wobbly crap and all. I was wondering how i configure the effects..like choose which ones and the key combonations for certain things like the cube.

Hey everyone. I'm on a fresh install of the Gusty beta. I have compiz and all working with the wobbly crap and all. I was wondering how i configure the effects..like choose which ones and the key combonations for certain things like the cube.
